title: Fidget Spinner Watch Face by GoKo
summary: The watch face you were waiting for! Spin this Fidget Spinner now on your watch.
description: Did you forget your spinner at home and need something to rotate?Prepare your Android wear watch and install the fidget spinner watch face right now on your device!Tap the spinner to rotate it faster and impress your friends!Customize all you want:- change the background color- change the watch color- colorize all parts of the spinner -> body, center and rings- decide if your spinner should rotate all the timeUpcoming features:- set an image as overlay- rotate counterSupported Android Wear watches:- all watches with wear 2.0 and higher
descriptionHTML:
Did you forget your spinner at home and need something to rotate?
Prepare your Android wear watch and install the fidget spinner watch face right now on your device!

Tap the spinner to rotate it faster and impress your friends!

Customize all you want:
- change the background color
- change the watch color
- colorize all parts of the spinner -> body, center and rings
- decide if your spinner should rotate all the time


Upcoming features:
- set an image as overlay
- rotate counter


Supported Android Wear watches:
- all watches with wear 2.0 and higher
comments: this watch face literally killing my watches battery life entirely
